description: Brighton: Ask BBC Sport your pre-season questions
title: Brighton: Ask BBC Sport your pre-season questions
title_page: Brighton: Ask BBC Sport your pre-season questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Brighton in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
We will put a selection of your questions on all things Albion to our BBC Sport expert.
